As a Technical Lead in the Enterprise Software Enablement team you, will be defining and executing strategies to drive Arm’s investment in collaborative development and the ongoing maintenance our relationship with those communities.  You will work with the Director of Open-Source Enablement who leads your team, which owns the strategy and execution for Arm in the enterprise market. WHAT WILL YOU BE ACCOUNTABLE FOR? As Arm grows so do opportunities for technical leadership. This is a highly visible role within Arm and a superb opportunity to act as a key spokesperson for the Arm partnership within the open-source software community. we are looking for you to demonstrate both your ability to work well with team members, partners and developer communities and your creativity with messaging, Arm’s strategy, and showcasing progress in support of outbound marketing teams and industry eventsOutstanding analytical and critical thinking skills to identify areas of focus and prioritization across a diverse set of requirementsExperience collaborating directly with architects and technology leads of internal and external software development teams to deliver your projectsExperience working in a global environment with diverse culturesDO YOU WANT TO IMPROVE YOUR CHANCES?
